ygData.subject: Re: Patch Update today - Selo's/Root
ygData.msgSnippet: Another thing that they may have made it dependant on, what if you are using your drum, versus a weapon in your hand? ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Another thing that they may have made it dependant on, what if you are using
your drum, versus a weapon in your hand?

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 1:24 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Update today


> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Tue, 28 Sep 1999, Douglass Family wrote:
> > >
> > >Is it possible they fully fleshed this out and made it
> > >level-dependent whether or not Accel breaks root? The code is
> >
> > I repeat, I was in HHpass and I am level 23 and a green Soothesayer
rooted
> > me solid, and it held for at least 20 secs.
>
> Maybe some mobs can always root you? There are some mobs that
> can always see invisible. Just throwing out suggestions that
> may fit the data.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
